Name: Descent of Divinity
Title: Albedo: Descent of Divinity
Desc: "The process of confirming the strategy for a duel also requires meticulous calculations..."
Source: Reward for inviting Albedo to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Descent of Divinity
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1604]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1604] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16042]</color>.
When there is $[A1604] on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116041]</color>, then your characters' $[K52] costs 1 less $[K309] and deals +1 DMG.
(You must have $[A1604] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C116041.Name: Solar Isotoma
C116041.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K106].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 3</color>\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When you perform "Switch Character" and this Summon is on the field:</color> This switch is considered a $[K2] instead of a $[K1]. (Once per Round)

K106.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>
K106.Desc:
Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Cryo Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Hydro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Pyro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2106}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Crystallize</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K2.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fast Action</color>
K2.Desc: You can continue with other actions after conducting 1 Fast Action.\nOnly after conducting 1 Combat Action will the turn pass over to your opponent.

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K52.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Plunging Attack</color>
K52.Desc: After a character is switched in to be the Active Character, should their next Combat Action within this Round be a Normal Attack, it will be considered a Plunging Attack for the instance.

K309.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1109}Unaligned Element</color>
K309.Desc: You may use Elemental Dice of any element to pay this type of cost.
